name: Ethan V.
content: "I am the guy that makes videos and stuff." -Ethan Vlad

name: Kapeeshwar S.
content: Kapeeshwar "KingKap" Sharma, more commonly known as Kapeesh, or simply Kap is the 2024-2025 Esports Lead. Kap manages all things Esports, including teams, competitions, tournament entries, and the Esports Gaming Room. In a concurrent position, Kap serves as the club's primary photographer. He photographs general meetings and events and leads the team photography seen throughout the website. To see more photography checkout Kap's photography page on Instagram: @konceptsbykap. You can reach Kap at kingkap4 anywhere.

name: Renee L.
content: Hi! My name is Renee and I am the socials lead for the school year. I am currently a second year studying Cognitive Science. My hometown is San Jose, CA but I lived in China for nine years before coming here :)
